lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi spoke for the great and the good of world soccer, not to mention millions of grassroots fans, when he acclaimed Leicester City’s extraordinary Premier League triumph by tweeting: “The reason why we all love football. Congratulations"

headline.print_headline: Soccer-Leicester Triumph Is Why We Love Football, Says Messi
headline.main: Soccer-Leicester Triumph Is Why We Love Football, Says Messi
